page.title: 20NEW HOUSING, CARNOUSTIE.
page.content: Many of the{houses}in Carnoustie were built about 100 years ago and are made of{stone}with traditional{slate {roofs.} When these houses were built very few had garages. Nowadays, however, with the great increase in the number of cars more garages are being built. This is noticeable in one of the biggest housing developments in the area, built by Charles Gray (Builders) Ltd., at Carlogie Green. 100 houses are already completed, 18 are still under construction, with future plans for another 38. The houses are timber-framed with a brickwork or blockwork outer wall and a roughcast finish. The roofs consist of concrete interlocking tiles on insulation board on roof trusses. As the company's advertising slogan goes --- Quality Homes in Ideal Locations.
